name: Fintelite
headline: Intelligent Process Automation for Lending.
description:
Fintelite's AI streamlines loan approvals and fraud detection, ensuring swift, accurate decisions.

Revolutionizing lending with AI-powered bank statement analysis and transaction data enrichment.

Fintelite empowers lenders with a next-generation approach to lending. Our AI platform utilizes:

Bank statement analysis: Gain deep insights into borrower financials through automated analysis.
Transaction data enrichment: Extract valuable details from transactions for a holistic financial picture.
These capabilities enable lenders to:

Reduce fraud: Identify and prevent suspicious activity with superior accuracy.
Accelerate approvals: Make faster, data-driven decisions with enriched information.
Optimize risk management: Tailor risk assessments based on comprehensive borrower data.
Passionate about building a future of responsible AI in financial services. I'm committed to helping lenders serve customers efficiently and securely.

Our help to others includes:
• BlubyBCA and ANZ increased efficiency by 15%
• Qazwa and KoinWorks sped up loan processing 10x, cutting costs by 25%

founders.name: Nadia Amalia, Founder
founders.description:
Hi!

I am Nadia CEO and Co-founder of Sribuu. 

I have been in the personal finance space since 2016. Before building Sribuu, I created the biggest financial literacy community in Indonesia, and has taught more than millions of people in Indonesia how to manage their money better through my social media contents!

I also previously worked as an investment analyst at Deutsche Bank and obtained my Master's degree in Finance from MIT.

founders.name: Nadia Fadhila, Founder
founders.description: I help to grow Fintelite to automate back office in finance industry. Our AI-driven back-office solutions focus on no-code OCR and rule-based automation for loan processing, underwriting, and insurance. My strength is in digital marketing, B2B lead generation, sales conversion and CRM.

## Intelligent Process Automation for Business
Automate your data entry and analysis to reduce cost up to 30%. Our AI extracts, enriches, and visualizes data from documents and databases in real time, enhancing decision making for your business. 
[ Try for Free ](http://www.fintelite.ai/<https:/app.fintelite.ai/en/registration/>)
[ Book Demo ](http://www.fintelite.ai/<https:/calendly.com/bd--gha>)
## Analytics Dashboard
### Visualise AI processed data to analyze and predict your business
Our AI driven analytics platform helps you to understand your customers to supercharge your lending or target the right customers.
![](https://fintelite.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/analysis.png)
## OCR+
### Extract data from documents and database real time
Our OCR+ extracts essential information from various documents such as e-statements, invoices, purchase orders, receipts, delivery notes, vehicle licenses, and customized documents.

## FAQ
What types of document are supported?
Our advanced OCR technology is designed to seamlessly extract data from a wide range of financial documents, including e-statements, invoices, receipts, and purchase orders in JPEG or PDF format.
What types of field can be detected?
Our OCR system excels in capturing critical information across various document types:
  1.     1. **Invoice/Receipt:** You can rely on our OCR to accurately extract key details, such as the merchant’s profile, line items, and payment information.
    2. **Bank Statement:** Our technology effortlessly retrieves essential data, including the account holder’s information, transaction records, and current balance.
    3. **Purchase Order:** For purchase orders, our OCR captures crucial data such as buyer and seller profiles, line item specifics, and shipment details with precision.


Do you support integration to our database?
Yes. We can assist you to integrate OCR results into your existing business process system. 
Our OCR system offers versatile export options to meet your specific needs. You can effortlessly export data to XLS (Excel) for comprehensive data analysis and reporting.
Additionally, our platform enables seamless integration with accounting software by exporting data in compatible templates.You also have the flexibility to relabel OCR results, ensuring accurate and customized data for your financial records.

At Fintelite, your privacy is paramount. We follow the highest security standards, including zero data retention on our API, and are ISO 27001 certified for robust data protection and compliance.

## FAQ
What types of document are supported?
Our advanced OCR technology is designed to seamlessly extract data from a wide range of financial documents, including e-statements, invoices, receipts, and purchase orders in JPEG or PDF format.
What types of field can be detected?
Our OCR system excels in capturing critical information across various document types:
  1.     1. **Invoice/Receipt:** You can rely on our OCR to accurately extract key details, such as the merchant’s profile, line items, and payment information.
    2. **Bank Statement:** Our technology effortlessly retrieves essential data, including the account holder’s information, transaction records, and current balance.
    3. **Purchase Order:** For purchase orders, our OCR captures crucial data such as buyer and seller profiles, line item specifics, and shipment details with precision.


Do you support integration to our database?
Yes. We can assist you to integrate OCR results into your existing business process system. 
Our OCR system offers versatile export options to meet your specific needs. You can effortlessly export data to XLS (Excel) for comprehensive data analysis and reporting.
Additionally, our platform enables seamless integration with accounting software by exporting data in compatible templates.You also have the flexibility to relabel OCR results, ensuring accurate and customized data for your financial records.

**Fintelite: Revolutionizing Lending with AI**

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator Batch W22, Fintelite is based in Singapore and consists of a dedicated team of 20. The company is driven by a compelling mission: to enhance lending through Intelligent Process Automation. At its core, Fintelite utilizes advanced AI technology to streamline loan approvals and bolster fraud detection, making the entire process swift and precise.

**What Fintelite Does**

Fintelite's platform primarily focuses on two key capabilities:
1. **Bank Statement Analysis:** Lenders can gain profound insights into a borrower's financial status through automated analyses of their bank statements.
2. **Transaction Data Enrichment:** By categorizing and enriching transaction details, Fintelite provides lenders a holistic view of a borrower's financial picture.

These features empower lenders to:
- **Reduce Fraud:** Detect and prevent fraudulent activities with enhanced accuracy.
- **Accelerate Approvals:** Speed up the decision-making process through data-driven insights.
- **Optimize Risk Management:** Perform tailored assessments of risk based on comprehensive borrower information.

Fintelite stands out by promising a future grounded in responsible AI within financial services. Its goal is to enable lenders to efficiently and securely serve their customers.

**Impact and Results**

The effectiveness of Fintelite’s solutions is evident in its partnerships:
- BlubyBCA and ANZ reported a 15% increase in operational efficiency.
- Qazwa and KoinWorks witnessed a tenfold acceleration in loan processing times, along with a 25% reduction in associated costs.

**Services and Products**

Fintelite offers a variety of products and services designed to cater to the specific needs of lenders, including:
- **OCR+ Data Extraction:** Digitizes data from diverse document types.
- **Fraud Verification:** Ensures the authenticity of documents.
- **Bank Statement Analyzer:** Transforms the underwriting process to be ten times faster.
- **Hyper-Personalized Engagement:** Delivers tailored experiences for both retail and corporate banking.

Additionally, Fintelite provides services like data entry and AI consultation, further supporting businesses in enhancing their operations.

**Commitment to Data Security**

Understanding the critical nature of data security, Fintelite adheres to top-notch security standards, including ISO 27001 certification. The company employs a zero data retention approach on its API, promoting robust data protection and compliance.

**Conclusion**

Fintelite is not just another fintech company; it’s a transformative force in the lending space. By combining innovative AI solutions with a commitment to responsible practices, it’s enabling lenders to make informed decisions, faster and more securely—perfectly illustrating how technology can reshape traditional industries. Interested parties can explore more at [Fintelite's website](http://www.fintelite.ai).
